title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about task oriented dialogue system in the context of low resource languages and multilinguality

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about task-oriented dialogue systems in the context of low resource languages and multilinguality. These articles cover various aspects of task-oriented dialogue systems, including their design, implementation, and evaluation in low resource languages and multilingual scenarios
Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Low-Resource Languages
This article provides an overview of task-oriented dialogue systems for low-resource languages and discusses their potential applications in various domains
Designing Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Low-Resource Languages
This article discusses the design considerations for task-oriented dialogue systems in low-resource languages, including the use of transfer learning and data augmentation techniques
Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems: A Survey
This article provides a comprehensive survey of multilingual task-oriented dialogue systems, including their architecture, evaluation, and applications
A Survey of Multilingual Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Low-Resource Languages
This article provides a detailed survey of multilingual task-oriented dialogue systems for low-resource languages, including their challenges and potential solutions
Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Low-Resource Languages: A Review
This article provides a comprehensive review of task-oriented dialogue systems for low-resource languages, including their design, implementation, and evaluation
Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems for Low-Resource Languages: A Case Study
This article presents a case study of a task-oriented dialogue system for a low-resource language, including its design, implementation, and evaluation

This article presents a comparative study of task-oriented dialogue systems for low-resource languages, including their performance and limitations
